00003 // Input:
00004 // A1: A or W: Ansi, Wide
00005 // A2: A or W
00006 
00007 // macros: (where x is 1 or 2)
00008 // IFx(ansi,wide)

00010 // Lx(a)        makes widechar

00013 #error A1 and A2 must be defined as A or W

00017
